00045 namespace {
00046   const uint32_t METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT = 10;
00047   const uint32_t MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH = 4;
00048 
00049   class MetaKeyBuilder {
00050   public:
00051     MetaKeyBuilder() : start(0), end(0) { return; }
00052     void
00053     build_keys(const char *format, uint32_t table_id, const char *row_key) {
00054       char *ptr;
00055       if (row_key) {
00056         start = new char [16 + strlen(row_key) + 1];
00057         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00058         strcat(start, row_key);
00059       }
00060       else {
00061         start = new char [16];
00062         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00063       }
00064       end = new char [16];
00065       sprintf(end, format, table_id);
00066       ptr = end + strlen(end);
00067       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00068       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00069       *ptr = 0;
00070 
00071     }
00072     ~MetaKeyBuilder() {
00073       delete [] start;
00074       delete [] end;
00075     }
00076     char *start;
00077     char *end;
00078   };
00079 }

00085 RangeLocator::RangeLocator(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr,
00086                            ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00087                            Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace)
00088     : m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace),
00089       m_root_stale(true), m_range_server(conn_mgr->get_comm(),
00090       HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_CLIENT_TIMEOUT) {
00091   time_t client_timeout;
00092 
00093   if ((client_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) != 0)
00094     m_range_server.set_default_timeout(client_timeout);
00095 
00096   int cache_size = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.LocationCache.MaxEntries", HYPERTABLE_LOCATIONCACHE_MAXENTRIES);
00097   m_cache_ptr = new LocationCache(cache_size);
00098 
00099   initialize();
00100 }

00122 void RangeLocator::initialize() {
00123   int error;
00124   DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00125   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00126   uint64_t handle;
00127   Schema *schema = 0;
00128 
00129   m_root_handler_ptr = new RootFileHandler(this);
00130 
00131   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_root_handler_ptr, &m_root_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00132     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00133     HT_THROW(error, "");
00134   }
00135 
00136   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables/METADATA", OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00137     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/tables/METADATA' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00138     HT_THROW(error, "");
00139   }
00140 
00141   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf)) != Error::OK) {
00142     HT_ERROR("Problem getting 'schema' attribute from METADATA hyperspace file");
00143     HT_THROW(error, "");
00144   }
00145 
00146   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00147 
00148   schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(), true);
00149   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00150     delete schema;
00151     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error for table METADATA : %s", schema->get_error_string());
00152     HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR, "");
00153   }
00154 
00155   m_metadata_schema_ptr = schema;
00156 
00157   m_metadata_table.name = "METADATA";
00158   m_metadata_table.id = 0;
00159   m_metadata_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00160 
00161   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00162 
00163   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("StartRow")) == 0) {
00164     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'StartRow' in METADATA schema");
00165     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, "");
00166   }
00167   m_startrow_cid = cf->id;
00168 
00169   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("Location")) == 0) {
00170     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'Location' in METADATA schema");
00171     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, "");
00172   }
00173   m_location_cid = cf->id;
00174 }

00177 RangeLocator::~RangeLocator() {
00178   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_root_file_handle);
00179 }

00182 
00183 void
00184 RangeLocator::find_loop(TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00185     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00186   int error;
00187   double wait_time = 1.0;
00188   double total_wait_time = 0.0;
00189 
00190   error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, hard);
00191 
00192   if (error == Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST) {
00193     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00194     m_last_errors.clear();
00195     HT_THROW(error, (std::string)"Table '" + table->name + "' is being dropped.");
00196   }
00197 
00198   while (error != Error::OK) {
00199 
00200     // check for timer expiration
00201     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time) {
00202       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00203       for (std::deque<std::string>::iterator iter = m_last_errors.begin(); iter != m_last_errors.end(); iter++)
00204         HT_ERRORF("%s", (*iter).c_str());
00205       m_last_errors.clear();
00206       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, (String)"Locating range for row = '" + row_key + "'");
00207     }
00208 
00209     // wait a bit
00210     poll(0, 0, (int)(wait_time*1000.0));
00211     total_wait_time += wait_time;
00212     wait_time *= 1.5;
00213 
00214     // try again
00215     if ((error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, true)) == Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST) {
00216       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00217       m_last_errors.clear();
00218       HT_THROW(error, (std::string)"Table '" + table->name + "' is being dropped.");
00219     }
00220   }
00221 
00222   {
00223     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00224     m_last_errors.clear();
00225   }
00226 }

00229 
00230 int
00231 RangeLocator::find(TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00232     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00233   RangeSpec range;
00234   ScanSpec meta_scan_spec;
00235   ScanBlock scan_block;
00236   int error;
00237   Key key;
00238   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00239   std::string start_row;
00240   std::string end_row;
00241   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00242   RowInterval ri;
00243   bool inclusive = (row_key == 0 || *row_key == 0) ? true : false;
00244 
00245   if (m_root_stale) {
00246     if ((error = read_root_location(timer)) != Error::OK)
00247       return error;
00248   }
00249 
00250   if (!hard && m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop))
00251     return Error::OK;
00252 
00256   if (table->id == 0 && (row_key == 0 || strcmp(row_key, Key::END_ROOT_ROW) < 0)) {
00257     rane_loc_infop->start_row = "";
00258     rane_loc_infop->end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00259     rane_loc_infop->location = m_root_range_info.location;
00260     return Error::OK;
00261   }
00262 
00265   range.start_row = 0;
00266   range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00267   memcpy(&addr, &m_root_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00268 
00269   MetaKeyBuilder meta_keys;
00270   char *meta_key_ptr;
00271 
00272   if (table->id == 0)
00273     meta_keys.build_keys("%d:", 0, row_key);
00274   else
00275     meta_keys.build_keys("0:%d:", table->id, row_key);
00276 
00280   meta_key_ptr = meta_keys.start+2;
00281   if (hard ||
00282       !m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00283 
00284     meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00285     meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00286     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00287     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00288 
00289     ri.start = meta_keys.start;
00290     ri.start_inclusive = true;
00291     ri.end = 0;
00292     ri.end_inclusive = false;
00293     meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00294 
00295     meta_scan_spec.return_deletes = false;
00296     // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00297 
00298     try {
00299       m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00300       m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range, meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00301     }
00302     catch (Exception &e) {
00303       return e.code();
00304     }
00305 
00306     if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00307       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00308       return error;
00309     }
00310 
00311     if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00312       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00313     }
00314 
00315     if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00316       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find metadata for row '%s' row_key=%s",
00317                 meta_keys.start, row_key);
00318       return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00319     }
00320   }
00321 
00322   if (table->id == 0)
00323     return Error::OK;
00324 
00329   range.start_row = rane_loc_infop->start_row.c_str();
00330   range.end_row   = rane_loc_infop->end_row.c_str();
00331 
00332   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00333       rane_loc_infop->location.c_str(), addr)) {
00334     HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' - %s",
00335               start_row.c_str(), rane_loc_infop->location.c_str());
00336     return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00337   }
00338 
00339   meta_scan_spec.clear();
00340 
00341   meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00342   meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00343   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00344   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00345 
00346   ri.start = meta_keys.start+2;
00347   ri.start_inclusive = true;
00348   ri.end = meta_keys.end+2;;
00349   ri.end_inclusive = true;
00350   meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00351 
00352   // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00353 
00354   if (m_conn_manager_ptr &&
00355       !m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(addr, (time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5))) {
00356     if (timer.expired())
00357       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00358   }
00359 
00360   try {
00361     m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00362     m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00363                                   meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00364   }
00365   catch (Exception &e) {
00366     return e.code();
00367   }
00368 
00369   if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00370     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00371     return error;
00372   }
00373 
00374   if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00375     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00376   }
00377 
00378   if (row_key == 0)
00379     row_key = "";
00380 
00381   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00382     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00383     m_last_errors.push_back((std::string)"RangeLocator failed to find metadata for table '" + table->name + "' row '" + row_key + "'");
00384     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH)
00385       m_last_errors.pop_front();
00386     return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00387   }
00388 
00389   return Error::OK;
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00396 int RangeLocator::process_metadata_scanblock(ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00397   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00398   ByteString bskey;
00399   ByteString value;
00400   Key key;
00401   const char *stripped_key;
00402   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00403   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00404 
00405   range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00406   range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00407   range_loc_info.location = "";
00408 
00409   bool got_start_row = false;
00410   bool got_end_row = false;
00411   bool got_location = false;
00412 
00413   while (scan_block.next(bskey, value)) {
00414 
00415     if (!key.load(bskey)) {
00416       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup for '%s' returned bad key", bskey.str());
00417       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00418     }
00419 
00420     if ((stripped_key = strchr(key.row, ':')) == 0) {
00421       HT_ERRORF("Bad row key found in METADATA - '%s'", key.row);
00422       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00423     }
00424     stripped_key++;
00425 
00426     if (got_end_row) {
00427       if (strcmp(stripped_key, range_loc_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00428         if (got_start_row && got_location) {
00429 
00433           if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00434               range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00435             HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' "
00436                       "- %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00437                       range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00438             return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00439           }
00440           if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00441             m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300, "RangeServer");
00442 
00443           m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00444           //cout << "(1) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start=" << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << endl;
00445         }
00446         else {
00447           boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00448           m_last_errors.push_back(format("Incomplete METADATA record found in "
00449               "root range under row key '%s'", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str()));
00450           while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH)
00451             m_last_errors.pop_front();
00452         }
00453         range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00454         range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00455         range_loc_info.location = "";
00456         got_start_row = false;
00457         got_end_row = false;
00458         got_location = false;
00459       }
00460     }
00461     else {
00462       table_id = (uint32_t)strtol(key.row, 0, 10);
00463       range_loc_info.end_row = stripped_key;
00464       got_end_row = true;
00465     }
00466 
00467     if (key.column_family_code == m_startrow_cid) {
00468       const uint8_t *str;
00469       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00470       //cout << "TS=" << key.timestamp << endl;
00471       range_loc_info.start_row = std::string((const char *)str, len);
00472       got_start_row = true;
00473     }
00474     else if (key.column_family_code == m_location_cid) {
00475       const uint8_t *str;
00476       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00477       range_loc_info.location = std::string((const char *)str, len);
00478       if (range_loc_info.location == "!")
00479         return Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST;
00480       got_location = true;
00481     }
00482     else {
00483       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup on row '%s' returned incorrect column (id=%d)",
00484                 bskey.str(), key.column_family_code);
00485     }
00486   }
00487 
00488   if (got_start_row && got_end_row && got_location) {
00489 
00493     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00494         range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00495       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' - %s",
00496           range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(), range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00497       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00498     }
00499     if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00500       m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300, "RangeServer");
00501 
00502     m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00503 
00504     //cout << "(2) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start=" << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << endl;
00505   }
00506   else if (got_end_row) {
00507     HT_ERRORF("Incomplete METADATA record found in root tablet under row key "
00508               "'%s'", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str());
00509   }
00510 
00511   return Error::OK;
00512 }

00516 
00520 int RangeLocator::read_root_location(Timer &timer) {
00521   int error;
00522   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00523   std::string addr_str;
00524 
00525   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_root_file_handle, "Location", value)) != Error::OK) {
00526     HT_ERRORF("Problem reading 'Location' attribute of Hyperspace file /hypertable/root - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00527     return error;
00528   }
00529 
00530   m_root_range_info.start_row  = "";
00531   m_root_range_info.end_row    = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00532   m_root_range_info.location   = (const char *)value.base;
00533 
00534   m_cache_ptr->insert(0, m_root_range_info, true);
00535 
00536   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr((const char *)value.base, m_root_addr)) {
00537     HT_ERROR("Bad format of 'Location' attribute of /hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00538     return Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION;
00539   }
00540 
00541   if (m_conn_manager_ptr) {
00542 
00543     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_root_addr, 8, "Root RangeServer");
00544 
00545     if (!m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_root_addr, (time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5))) {
00546       std::string addr_str;
00547       HT_ERRORF("Timeout (20s) waiting for root RangeServer connection - %s",
00548                    InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, m_root_addr));
00549     }
00550   }
00551 
00552   m_root_stale = false;
00553 
00554   return Error::OK;
00555 }
